wordGroup: salmonella typhi [医]伤寒杆菌；[医]伤寒沙门氏菌

sentences.en: He was suffering from salmonella poisoning.
sentences.cn: 他当时正忍受着沙门氏菌中毒的折磨。

sentences.en: He points to progress made on a salmonella vaccine.
sentences.cn: 他指出了沙门氏菌疫苗的进展。

sentences.en: How does Salmonella get into foods?
sentences.cn: 沙门氏菌是如何污染食物的？
